com.metsci.glimpse.support.shader.triangle

Class ColorTexture2DProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.metsci.glimpse.support.shader.triangle.ColorTexture2DProgram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DrawableTextureProgram

    public class ColorTexture2DProgram
extends Object
implements DrawableTextureProgram
    Applies a 2d rgba texture to triangles specified in axis coordinates.
    See Also:
    WatermarkPainter

      • dispose

        public void dispose(GlimpseContext context)
        Deletes the program, and resets this object to the way it was before #begin(GL2ES2) was first called.

        This object can be safely reused after being disposed, but in most cases there is no significant advantage to doing so.

        Specified by:
        dispose in interface DrawableTextureProgram
